en: sound of cloth ripping or rain beating down
This field is bigger than that one.

ngiemboon: Gʉa na ngáb gi, ńgwoon gẅi.
en: Among the chickens there, stop yours.

ngiemboon: Nkáʼ wég wɔɔn, é gẅí gwɔ́.
en: Here is our field, where is yours.

ngiemboon: Tóo ḿbí nkẅíŋ gẅie é nuŋe jʉʼɔɔn lɔɔn ńdɔg ńgʉa.
en: Come and take the wood that is here to leave.

ngiemboon: Á zɛ́tè megẅǐɛ mentá tá mmo yɔɔn poŋ.
en: It takes three steps for this thing to succeed.
